content: next 3 fpsc repeat to end row 4 turn chain 3 counts as first double_crochet skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 1 fpsc in next 3 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat to end row 5 turn chain 3 counts as first double_crochet skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 3 fpsc 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat to end row 6 - 9 repeat row 2 5 once this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-noncommercial-share alike 3 0 united states license sweeper cardi by tiffany roots craftination wordpress com optional row 10 turn single_crochet around edges spacing stitches evenly across each side working 3 single_crochet into each corner row 11 join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch chain 2 half_double_crochet across to last single_crochet before corner single_crochet begins if you have skipped row 10 your row 11 will read turn chain 2 half_double_crochet across in each double_crochet row 12 turn chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet across to end working last half_double_crochet into chain 2 of last row row 13 - 14 repeat row 12 twice row 15 turn chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 12 half_double_crochet 13 half_double_crochet made row 16 turn chain 2 half_double_crochet across row 17 - 20 repeat row 16 four times row 21 turn slip_stitch to opposite edge of swiffer to appropriate 13 stitches fasten off strap row 1 turn and attach yarn with slip_stitch to opposite side row 1 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 12 half_double_crochet 13 half_double_crochet total row 2 - 6 repeat row 16 five times row 7 buttonhole row turn chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet row 8 turn chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in chain-1 half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet fasten_off sew the button in the 2nd row of the cover base slip on to your cleaner button and enjoy this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-noncommercial-share alike 3 0 united states license
